text:
所以，為什麼要有多元收入？
因為它就像是撐在你生活下的一把大傘，幫你遮擋那些突如其來的風雨。 無論是副業、投資，還是做些自由接案，多元收入可以讓你在危機來臨時不至於手足無措。
想讓生活更有保障、更穩定？ 那就不要再把希望全部壓在一份工作上。
留言「我要了解」，我帶你一起找出適合的多元收入方式，讓我們一起撐住那些不期而至的風險！
trans:
So, why is it important to have multiple income streams?
Because it’s like an umbrella supporting your life, shielding you from unexpected storms. Whether it’s a side hustle, investment, or freelancing, multiple income streams can help you stay steady during crises and avoid panic.
Want more security and stability in life? Then don’t put all your hopes on a single job.
Comment “I want to learn more,” and I’ll guide you to discover income streams that suit you. Let’s face those unforeseen risks together!
